metadata.title: Rubrik Advanced Threat Hunt
metadata.description: This playbook fetches the object mapped with incident and starts advance threat hunt.
prerequisites: 1. The Rubrik Security Cloud data connector should be configured to send appropriate events to Microsoft Sentinel.

2. The Rubrik Security Cloud solution should be configured to [connect to Rubrik Security Cloud API end points using a Service Account](https://docs.rubrik.com/en-us/saas/saas/polaris_api_access_with_service_accounts.html), the service account should be assigned a role that includes the relevant privileges necessary to perform the desired operations (see [Roles and Permissions](https://docs.rubrik.com/en-us/saas/saas/common/roles_and_permissions.html) in the Rubrik Security Cloud user guide).
3. Rubrik custom connector needs to be deployed prior to the deployment of this playbook, in the same resource group and region. Relevant instructions can be found in the connector doc page.
4. Store Service account credentials in Key Vault and obtain keyvault name and tenantId
a. Create a Key Vault with unique name
b. Go to KeyVault -> secrets -> Generate/import and create 'Rubrik-AS-Int-ClientId' & 'Rubrik-AS-Int-ClientSecret' for storing client_id and client_secret respectively
a. Create a Team with public channel.
b. Click on three dots (...) present on right side of the your newly created teams channel and Get link to the channel.
c. copy the text from the link between /channel and /, decode it using online url decoder and copy it to use as channelId.
d. copy the text of groupId parameter from link to use as groupId.
postDeployment: Once deployment is complete, authorize each connection like keyvault.
**b. Assign Role to add comment into incident**
1. Go to Log Analytics Workspace → <your workspace> → Access Control → Add
3. Assignment type: Job function roles -> Add 'Microsoft Sentinel Contributor' as a Role
4. Members: select managed identity for assigned access to and add your logic app as member
1. In Microsoft sentinel, analytical rules should be configured to trigger an incident.
2. To manually run the playbook on a particular incident follow the below steps:
a. Go to Microsoft Sentinel -> <your workspace> -> Incidents
c. In the right pane, click on Actions, and from the dropdown select the 'Run Playbook' option.
d. Click on the Run button beside this playbook.

metadata.description: Hostname of the RubrikApi instance (Ex: customer.my.rubrik.com)
Enter Id of the Teams Group where the adaptive card will be posted
Enter Id of the Teams Channel where the adaptive card will be posted
Time Interval in minutes for checking hunt status (Ex: 5)
Time limit in minutes for checking hunt status (Ex: 720)

runError.message: Object ID is not mapped with Incident

body.messageBody:
{
    "$schema": "http://adaptivecards.io/schemas/adaptive-card.json",
    "type": "AdaptiveCard",
    "version": "1.3",
    "body": [
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "size": "Large",
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "text": "Start a Threat Hunt - Advanced Hunt",
            "horizontalAlignment": "Center",
            "style": "heading",
            "color": "Accent",
            "fontType": "Default",
            "wrap": true,
            "id": "heading"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Parameters to start an Advanced Threat hunt",
            "wrap": true,
            "style": "default",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "info"
        },
		{
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Object ID = @{variables('Object_ID')}\n\nIncident Start Time =@{variables('Incident_Start_Time')}",
            "wrap": true,
            "style": "default",
            "color": "accent",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "x"
        },
        {
    "type": "TextBlock",
    "text": "**Note:** Provide at least one of the following: File Hash, File Pattern, or YARA Rule. A maximum of 10 total values are allowed across all fields (e.g., 2 file hashes, 1 file pattern, and 1 YARA rule would count as 4 values).",
    "wrap": true,
    "color": "Attention",
    "spacing": "Medium",
    "id": "InputNote"
},
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "File Hashes to scan",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip1"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Text",
            "id": "File hash",
             "isMultiline": true,
            "placeholder": "Enter comma-separated file hashes (MD5, SHA1, or SHA256)"
        },
         {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "File Pattern to scan",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip2"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Text",
            "id": "File pattern",   
             "isMultiline": true,
            "placeholder": "Enter comma-separated file pattern"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "YARA rule to scan",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip3"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Text",
            "id": "YARA rule",   
             "isMultiline": true,
            "placeholder": "Enter YARA rule as text"
        },
         {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Threat Hunt Name",
            "wrap": true,
            "separator": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "id": "Ip4"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Text",
            "id": "Threat Hunt Name",
            "isRequired": true,
            "label": "required",
            "errorMessage": "Please provide Threat Hunt Name"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Time Range",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip5"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.ChoiceSet",
            "choices": [
                {
                    "title": "Most recent snapshot only (For each object, only scan the most recent snapshot.)",
                    "value": "Most recent"
                },
               {
                  "title": "Custom time range (Scan all snapshots of each object taken during a specific time range.)",
                   "value": "Custom"
               }
            ],
            "id": "Time Range",
            "value": "Most recent",
            "style": "expanded"
        },
         {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Below Input arguments required only if Custom time range is selected above.",
            "wrap": true,
            "style": "default",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "ip6"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Scan from Date",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip7"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Date",
            "id": "Start Date"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Scan from Time",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip35"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.ChoiceSet",
            "choices": @{variables('Hourly_Time_List')},
            "id": "Start Time",
            "value": "00:00",
            "style": "compact"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Scan to Date",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip8"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Date",
            "id": "End Date"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Scan to Time",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip36"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.ChoiceSet",
            "choices": @{variables('Hourly_Time_List')},
            "id": "End Time",
            "value": "00:00",
            "style": "compact"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Max Snapshots per Object",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip9"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Number",
            "id": "Max Snapshots per Object",
            "value": "10"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Limit for start hunt (if no matches found in specified time range)",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip19"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Number",
            "id": "Loop Limit",
            "value": "1"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Time Delta to update the date range of scan",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip20"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Number",
            "id": "Time Delta",
            "label": "In days",
            "value": "5"
        },
        {
    "type": "TextBlock",
    "text": "**Set Limits**",
    "wrap": true,
    "style": "default",
    "separator": true,
    "spacing": "Medium",
    "id": "LimitNote"
},    
      {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Stop Scanning a Snapshot After",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip10"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.ChoiceSet",
            "choices": [
                {
                    "title": "1 IOC is found",
                    "value": "1"
                },
               {
                  "title": "All IOCs are found",
                   "value": "All"
               }
            ],
            "id": "Max Matches Per Snapshot",
            "value": "1",
            "style": "expanded"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Min File Size",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip11"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Number",
            "id": "Min File Size",
            "label": "In Bytes",
            "value": "1"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Max File Size",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip22"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Number",
            "id": "Max File Size",
            "label": "In Bytes",
            "value": "15000000"
        },
       {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Earliest File Creation Date",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip12"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Date",
            "id": "Earliest File Creation Date"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Earliest File Creation Time",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip45"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.ChoiceSet",
            "choices": @{variables('Hourly_Time_List')},
            "id": "Earliest File Creation Time",
            "value": "00:00",
            "style": "compact"
        },
       {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Latest File Creation Date",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip13"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Date",
            "id": "Latest File Creation Date"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Latest File Creation Time",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip46"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.ChoiceSet",
            "choices": @{variables('Hourly_Time_List')},
            "id": "Latest File Creation Time",
            "value": "00:00",
            "style": "compact"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Earliest File Modification Date",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip14"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Date",
            "id": "Earliest File Modification Date"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Earliest File Modification Time",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip47"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.ChoiceSet",
            "choices": @{variables('Hourly_Time_List')},
            "id": "Earliest File Modification Time",
            "value": "00:00",
            "style": "compact"
        },
         {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Latest File Modification Date",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip15"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Date",
            "id": "Latest File Modification Date"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Latest File Modification Time",
            "wrap": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "Ip48"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.ChoiceSet",
            "choices": @{variables('Hourly_Time_List')},
            "id": "Latest File Modification Time",
            "value": "00:00",
            "style": "compact"
        },
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Use this section to add file extensions, paths, and patterns to include and exclude from this hunt.",
            "wrap": true,
            "style": "default",
            "separator": true,
            "id": "ip21"
        },
       {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Include Files",
            "wrap": true,
            "separator": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "id": "Ip16"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Text",
            "id": "Include Files",
            "value": "@{join(variables('Include_Files'), ',')}"
        }, 
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Exclude Files",
            "wrap": true,
            "separator": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "id": "Ip17"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Text",
            "id": "Exclude Files",
            "placeholder": "Example: c:/user/joe_user/*"
        },
         {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "Exclude Files Except",
            "wrap": true,
            "separator": true,
            "weight": "Bolder",
            "id": "Ip18"
        },
        {
            "type": "Input.Text",
            "id": "Exclude Except",
            "placeholder": "Example: c:/user/joe_user/stock_tips",
            "label": "These files will be included in the hunt even if they're a subset of the excluded files."
        }
    ],
    "actions": [
        {
            "type": "Action.Submit",
            "title": "Submit Answer",
            "data": {
                "id": "LoginVal"
            },
            "style": "positive",
            "id": "Submit"
        }
    ]
}

body.message:
Advance Hunt | @{formatDateTime(utcNow(), 'MMMM d yyyy')}

Hunt Name: @{body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Threat Hunt Name']}

Hunt Start Time: @{body('Check_Advance_Threat_Hunt_Status')?['data']?['threatHuntDetailV2']?['startTime']}

Hunt End Time: @{body('Check_Advance_Threat_Hunt_Status')?['data']?['threatHuntDetailV2']?['endTime']}

Total IOCs: @{length(body('Check_Advance_Threat_Hunt_Status')?['data']?['threatHuntDetailV2']?['baseConfig']?['ioc']?['iocList']?['indicatorsOfCompromise'])}

Unique File Matches: @{body('Check_Advance_Threat_Hunt_Status')?['data']?['threatHuntDetailV2']?['totalUniqueFileMatches']}

Scanned Objects: @{body('Check_Advance_Threat_Hunt_Status')?['data']?['threatHuntObjectMetrics']?['totalObjectsScanned']}

Affected Objects: @{body('Check_Advance_Threat_Hunt_Status')?['data']?['threatHuntObjectMetrics']?['totalAffectedObjects']}

Scanned Snapshots: @{body('Check_Advance_Threat_Hunt_Status')?['data']?['threatHuntDetailV2']?['totalScannedSnapshots']}

Matched Snapshots: @{body('Check_Advance_Threat_Hunt_Status')?['data']?['threatHuntDetailV2']?['totalMatchedSnapshots']}


@{variables('Rubrik_Hunt_Link')}

inputs.name: Rubrik_Hunt_Link
inputs.value: Click on the link for more information: Click here

body.message: Comment limit to an incident has been breached.

inputs.name: Min_File_Size
inputs.value: @if(or(empty(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Min File Size']), lessOrEquals(int(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Min File Size']), 0)), 1, int(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Min File Size']))

inputs.name: Max_File_Size
inputs.value: @if(or(empty(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Max File Size']), lessOrEquals(int(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Max File Size']), 0)), 15000000, int(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Max File Size']))

inputs.name: Earliest_File_Creation_Time
inputs.value: @concat(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Earliest File Creation Date'], 'T', body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Earliest File Creation Time'], ':00Z')

inputs.name: Latest_File_Creation_Time
inputs.value: @concat(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Latest File Creation Date'], 'T', body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Latest File Creation Time'], ':00Z')

lessOrEquals: @concat(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Earliest File Creation Date'], 'T', body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Earliest File Creation Time'], ':00Z')
@concat(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Latest File Creation Date'], 'T', body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Latest File Creation Time'], ':00Z')

inputs.name: Earliest_File_Modification_Time
inputs.value: @concat(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Earliest File Modification Date'], 'T', body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Earliest File Modification Time'], ':00Z')

inputs.name: Latest_File_Modification_Time
inputs.value: @concat(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Latest File Modification Date'], 'T', body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Latest File Modification Time'], ':00Z')

lessOrEquals: @concat(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Earliest File Modification Date'], 'T', body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Earliest File Modification Time'], ':00Z')

@concat(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Latest File Modification Date'], 'T', body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Latest File Modification Time'], ':00Z')

runError.message: Provide at least one of the following: File Hash, File Pattern, or YARA Rule. A maximum of 10 total values are allowed across all fields (e.g., 2 file hashes, 1 file pattern, and 1 YARA rule would count as 4 values).

value.maxSnapshotsPerObject: @if(or(empty(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Max Snapshots per Object']), lessOrEquals(int(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Max Snapshots per Object']), 0)), 10, int(body('Get_Input_To_Start_Advance_Threat_Hunt')?['data']?['Max Snapshots per Object']))
